title: Love, Peace & Joy: 3 Short Stories
description: Love, Peace & Joy is guaranteed to fill readers hearts with the magical, mystical spirit of Christmas.Three short stories filled with all the ingredients of a holiday season like none fun, family, food, love, music and the potent gift of giving.The perfect holiday gift and one you won't A Holly Spriggs Jolly Christmas, Chocolate Covered Kisses and Joyeux Noelle.Enjoy!
author: Stephany Tullis
